text: Læa meux di mi xongkar dı mayang phwk khea phwk khea k klaw wa rea ca mi sraththa penxankhad cnkwa rea ca di rab yeiyng sing thi brrda rx sul khx ngxallxhˌ di rab ma læw xallxhˌ pen phuthrng rxbru ying n thi thi phraxngkh ca thrng hı mi sar khxng phraxngkh khun brrda khwam tatxy læa kar lngthosʹ xan runræng ca kxallxhˌ nan ca prasb kæ brrda phu thi krathakhwamphid neuxngcak kar thi phwk khea wang xubay hlxklwng kan
